Event Manager:

Event Participation Method:

While hunting monsters in Lineage 2, you have a chance of obtaining items marked with letters or numbers. Collect a certain combination of them and bring them to me, and I will exchange them for prizes!

There are a total of 12 letters and numbers:
T, H, R, O, N, E, L, I, N, G, A, II

These letters and numbers can be combined to make the words LINEAGEII and THRONE. The prizes are different for each combination. Different prizes may be awarded even for the same combinations.

Event Prize Information:

If you collect THRONE, you can receive one of the following prizes:
1 - Ring of Ant Queen
1 - Ring of Core
1 - Artisans Goggles
1 - Little Angel Wings
2 - Scroll Enchant Weapon B Grade
3 - Scroll Enchant Weapon C Grade
4 - Scroll Enchant Weapon D Grade
1 - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
1 - Blessed Scroll of Escape
2 - Random L2 Day Buff Scrolls 2 of the same type

If you collect LINEAGEII, you can receive one of the following prizes:
1 - Ring of Ant Queen
1 - Ring of Core
1 - Fairy Antennae
1 - Feathered Hat
1 - Rabbit Ears
1 - Scroll Enchant Weapon A Grade
2 - Scroll Enchant Weapon B Grade
3 - Scroll Enchant Weapon C Grade
1 - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
1 - Blessed Scroll of Escape
3 - Random L2 Day Buff Scrolls 3 of the same type
